newsitem.title: SWEDEN: MoDo rises over 4 pct on 9 mo results.
newsitem.headline: MoDo rises over 4 pct on 9 mo results.

text.p: Swedish forestry company MoDo rose over four percent on the Stockhom bourse on Wednesday as it posted better than expected results for the first nine months of 1996.
At 1120 GMT MoDo shares were 7.5 crowns higher at 185 crowns after opening with gains, while the overall market was up 0.24 percent with forestry stocks leading the rise with a 0.85 percent rise.
The company reported a 43 percent slump in nine month profits compared to a year ago with profit after financial items posted at 2.47 billion crowns.
But the result was better than a market consensus for a profit of 2.24 billion crowns.
